law.catch_line: Assertion of adverse claim against entitlement holder.
law.text: An action based on an adverse claim to a financial asset, whether framed in conversion, replevin, constructive trust, equitable lien, or other theory, may not be asserted against a person who acquires a security entitlement under KRS 355.8-501 for value and without notice of the adverse claim.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 155, effective January 1, 1997.
